title: Pregnant In Heels
description: Author of My Dark Hero, S.L. DeBois's latest novella Pregnant in When Ava Simmons got shipped over by her mother to live with her loving big sister, Parker, in San Diego, she wasn’t exactly excited to tell her that she was pregnant at nineteen. With Parker's help, Ava changes from being a unprepared-for-life kinda girl to a woman ready to take on her biggest challenges becoming a mother and following her heart.Together, Parker and Ava realize that even when unexpected things happen—like when a man Parker swore to never care for starts finding his way into her heart, and when a boy Ava thought she once loved deeply conflicts with the man who now had a hold of not only her own, but also her baby’s heart—you just gotta keep going down that road called life and see where it takes you.Pregnant in Heels is a romantic comedy novella that will have you laughing, crying, and leave you content.More by S.L. My Dark Hero - Novella
author: Deboise
